column2:
'dependencies_dir = "./dependencies"'
'os.makedirs(dependencies_dir, exist_ok=True)'
'Now, create the file in the dependencies directory. The cell elow uses IPython magic to'
'write the file into the directory you just created.'
'Python'
'%%writefile {dependencies_dir}/conda.yml'
'name: model-env'
'channels :'
'- conda-forge'
'dependencies :'
'- python=3.8'
'- numpy=1.21.2'
'- pip=21.2.4'
'- scikit-learn=0.24.2'
